SOL3MATES X LEVEL SHOES

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=752&user=10620> 	

SOL3MATES announces that Level Shoes is the first global retailer to carry the SOL3MATES 320s.

A perfect partnership, rooted in a shared passion for innovation, culture, and craftsmanship.

Step into the future with us — this is only the beginning.

Shop the full 320s collection now, exclusively at Level Shoes <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=753&user=10620> .

Shop the full 320s collection now, exclusively at Level Shoes <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=753&user=10620> .

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-3-min.png> 	

TORY BURCH CELEBRATES THE SPRING 2025 COLLECTION

On April 11th, Tory Burch celebrated her Spring 2025 collection at Skooni, a creative space transformed with turquoise pool tiles inspired by her Brooklyn runway show. Guests enjoyed standout looks and live performances by Shana and DJ duo DJette & Caline.
The celebrations began on April 10th with an in-store meet & greet with VIPs, followed by the Middle East launch of the Sublime fragrance at The Lana’s Veranda Restaurant. 
Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=754&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=754&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-4-min.png> 	

Join our Group's Football Team Trials

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/52fa3a14f9f7d07a678ab168020422671832464402.jpg> 	

Are you passionate about football and ready to show off your skills? The Chalhoub Group Football Team is on the lookout for young talents to join our squad!
TRIAL DETAILS: EVERY THURSDAY 8:00 PM - 9:30 PM
We want to see what you've got- no matter the position you play! Open to all youngsters eager to play, grow, and compete as part of a dynamic and supportive team.
For more details, contact Anas.Daba@chalhoub.com / Whatsapp: 0561118116

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-7-min.png> 	

 Tech&Data Town Hall

Last week, the Tech&Data team had a powerful morning of alignment, energy, and momentum as we came together for their first Town Hall of 2025, celebrating key wins - from Ramadan readiness and the launch of Cosmos, to progress on some of our AI innovations like Layla and Lumi. We also reflected on where we’re headed next, with a clear focus on Q2 priorities.The theme of Change, Partnership, and Impact was present in every conversation.
Read More <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=755&user=10620> 
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=755&user=10620>
